item.title: Ruby 基础
item.description: 环境 在Mac上使用RubyMine进行调试前需要先安装ruby-debug-ide。按照提示安装时一直失败，显示如下报错信息： Failed to Install Gems. Following gems were not installed: /Applications/RubyMine.app/Contents/plugins/ruby/rb/gems/debase-2.3.2.gem: Error installing debase-2.3.2.gem: ERROR: Failed to build gem native extension. 遇到这种错误可以使用Homebrew安装ruby——使用命令brew install ru
